price: 59. Marabna nek naharsi rabay addunyal abne akke waytek, kaadu nanu diggalsimewaa mara hinnino innaa Jannat culleek lakal?
arabic: إِلَّا مَوۡتَتَنَا ٱلۡأُولَىٰ وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: illā mawtatanā al-ūlā wamā naḥnu bimuʿadhabīna
